# name

**Instance Property**

A descriptive name for the anchor.

## Declaration

```swift
var name: String? { get }
```

## Discussion

To name an anchor, create one with the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARAnchor/init(name:transform:)] initializer. This property is `nil` for anchors created otherwise.

ARKit does not display the name to users, but your app can use it to identify anchors for debugging.

## Creating Anchors

- **init(transform:)**: Creates a new anchor object with the specified transform.
- **init(name:transform:)**: Creates a new anchor object with the specified transform and a descriptive name.

items.description: Creates a new anchor object with the specified transform.
items.name: init(transform:)

items.description: Creates a new anchor object with the specified transform and a descriptive name.
